EmailTemplate.name: Complete Finger Printing
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Complete Application FingerPrinting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!LicenseApplication__c.Application_Submitted_By__c},
The Application for {!LicenseApplication__c.Location_DBA__c}} has been completed but the fingerprints have not been updated in Salesforce. Please follow up with the location and confirm this has been completed. Thank you,
Link to Record:
{!LicenseApplication__c.Link}
